price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߡߊ߬ߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬ߟߌ ߞߍ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߕߎ߲߰ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߣߌ ߛߊ߬ߥߏ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߞߏ ߓߍ߯ ߘߏ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߖߙߌ߫
arabic: وَكَذَّبُواْ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡۚ وَكُلُّ أَمۡرٖ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wakadhabū wa-ittabaʿū ahwāahum wakullu amrin mus'taqirrun
